channel.title: Football betting - UK
channel.description:
Anyone put a coupon on at the weekends? If so what's your predictions?
Just stuck mine on there: Liverpool Arsenal West Brom Burnley Dundee Utd Dunfermline Cowdenbeath
7 fold @ 79.5/1 fiver on, roughly £400 if it comes in.
Share yours.
